description: Test file for RecipesList page component, using Vitest framework. Contains mock data setup, store state management, and test scenarios verifying loading, display, and filtering of recipes.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the RecipesList page component.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines individual test cases within the test suite.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up initial store state before each test execution.

methods.name: RecipesList.create
methods.description: Creates an instance or reference to the RecipesList component/page.

methods.name: page.mounted
methods.description: Simulates the component/component page mounting lifecycle, triggering data loads.
